name: Custom E-commerce Platform
description: A revolutionary e-commerce platform with AI-powered recommendations and seamless user experience
key_features: AI-powered product recommendations based on user behavior
Real-time inventory management with automated restocking
user_flows: Discovery -> Product View -> Add to Cart -> Checkout -> Payment -> Tracking -> Review

technical_requirements.frontend: Next.js with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
technical_requirements.backend: Node.js with GraphQL and microservices architecture
technical_requirements.database: MongoDB with Redis caching and Elasticsearch for search
